Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
The Customer class represents a customer in the booking system.
Author:
Ashlesha Shrestha, Nishan Shrestha

      public void populate(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Populates the customer with bookings from the booking system.
      Parameters:
      flightBookingSystem - the flight booking system
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if an error occurs while populating
